thought.text: Perfect! I can see that the write method already sets up `self.data.header.cols` and calls `self.data._set_fill_values(cols)`. I need to add the formatting setup right after this. Let me add the formatting code:

cols = list(table.columns.values())

        self.data.header.cols = cols

action.new_str:
cols = list(table.columns.values())

        self.data.header.cols = cols
        self.data.cols = cols

        if isinstance(self.data.fill_values, tuple):
            self.data.fill_values = [self.data.fill_values]

        self.data._set_fill_values(cols)
        
        # Apply column formatting if formats are specified
        self.data._set_col_formats()
